Articles.Content:
Still with v0.90.. baffing around while RSS V1.02 is still busy....

Twiddle thumbs.. and what do I do...

Well... I'll just make my own ISS... it's more of a testing ground for greater things to come.... so NASA *promises* us ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

In reality testing MechJeb and different rocket weights... not happy with mechjeb (a bit dense)

![aGYq8Mt.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/aGYq8Mt.jpg)

Switched off MechJeb at 100km altitude and manually piloted to orbit..

![lnMvc9C.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/lnMvc9C.jpg)

A heavier myISS2 section swayed on liftoff, but MechJeb held this just fine.

I was contemplating manual control, but my pilot experience let it go a while longer.

![6LcLPOX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6LcLPOX.jpg)

Dumping myISS2 sections

![vWwR0Jk.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vWwR0Jk.jpg)

myISS2 was overloaded so docked (difficultly) and transferred fuel, then dumped last stage.

![TPHS8vL.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TPHS8vL.jpg)

.. then redocked as per plan

![oFrt7uI.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/oFrt7uI.jpg)

Hydrogen is light stuff.. lets place empty tanks on myISS.

Why... ***Coz we can*** and it's good for health...![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

SRB separations on myISS3

![3a5217I.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/3a5217I.jpg)

Final stage separation on myISS3 (thought the sunspot looked ok)

![OwKDeQP.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OwKDeQP.jpg)

myISS3 approach..

![4RfX7bo.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/4RfX7bo.jpg)

all docked..

![2O13Mhl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2O13Mhl.jpg)

.. and a good old chat/skinner session...![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif):cool:

![Qfgmh0c.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Qfgmh0c.jpg)
